name: SmelterUPSGrade-SEFork
author: Kingdud, bjerkles
title: Smelter UPSGrade - SE Fork
description: Space Exploration friendly version. A single smelter that is equivalent to 405 smelters (configurable 25-2000). Size is intended to scale with the footprint of the underlying build that this replaces. Currently uses vanilla beacon behavior for the maths.
